category.title: Kotong 'racket'
category.description: location of legal but abused checkpoint, such as for emission testing

category.title: Kotong 'stakeout' point
category.description: location of 'violation trap' bec of hidden traffic sign or hard-to-follow traffic rule

category.title: Kotong incident w/Perpetrator Info
category.description: report of location of actual 'kotong' incident w/information on traffic enforcer (name, rank, PD, etc. -- pls include in Description box)

category.title: ACTION TAKEN
category.description: report has been noted by gov't partner and flagged for action (to be marked by admin)
